cast.name: 克里斯·德埃利亚 Chris D'Elia

writer.name: 克里斯·德埃利亚 Chris D'Elia

director.name: 比尔·德埃利亚 Bill D'Elia

this_title: Chris D'Elia: White Male. Black Comic
trans_title: 克里斯·德埃利亚：白人黑话
introduction: Powerhouse stand-up Chris D'Elia takes New Orleans by storm in his very first one-hour stand-up special. British dudes, drunk girls and bears on romantic dates at Applebee's. Hey, why is it that we are the only species that makes love, anyway? Chris D'Elia explains the hilarious truth and more in this dynamic new special.
chinese_title: 克里斯·德埃利亚：白人黑话
foreign_title: Chris D'Elia: White Male. Black Comic
